name: Cleaning Redville
description:
A small town in the middle of the woods.. Your job is to make sure it's clean.

However, the place has its rumors. Is everything what it seems? Are you sure that you are safe? Is your job even normal here?

Controls: W,A,S,D to Walk and Drive the vehicle. Use mouse to interact with things.

Expected Game Time: Around 20 minutes.

Made under a week for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1
